topics.body:
"@JustLikeTheNewGuy":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547aba0e6368720faa310000#post_547aba0e6368720faa310000
The real world explanation is that in pokemon breeding, They get moves from the father, And species from the mother. Since you can only get one Eevee in most games, They wanted to make it so you couldn't just breed an army of them. (You'd need a Ditto, Which can breed with anyone, And the species will be the one that's not a ditto)

In game explanation, I have no clue. (And I don't really care, For obvious reasons)
